content.rendered:
Sajid is lecturer of Accounting and Finance in the department of Business Management at Regent college. He is Chartered Certified Accountant working in a top 40 accountancy practice as team leader, he has been working since 2012 as tax and business consultant with focus on financial reporting: corporation tax, and VAT consultancy to national and multinational organisations; UK GAAP and IFRS principles.

He hold a Master degree in Business Administration and has worked with UK Universities and Supervised students conducting research in their final year of graduation. He has more than 7 years experience in teaching various modules from lever 4 to 7, and has written numerous Accounting workbooks on different topics.

 Courses taught

  • Managing Financial Principles and Techniques
  • Managing Financial Resources and Decisions
  • Taxation
  • Auditing
  • Financial Performance Management Level
  • Financial Statement Analysis
  • Business Decision Making Level
  • Business Strategy
  • Business Environment
  • Marketing Principles
  • Financial Accounting and Reporting Level
  • Small Business Enterprises Level
  • Working with and Leading People Level
  • Issue in Global Business
